directions: Place daikon in a colander and press down lightly to drain excess water.
Bring dashi to a boil in a large Japanese nabe or pot over medium heat. Add daikon; return to a boil. Add tofu, bring to a boil, and reduce heat to low. Add mitsuba and salt.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) package silken tofu, cut into bite-size pieces
title: Vegan Japanese Tofu Pot-Au-Feu (Yuki Nabe)
